hanzi-su-wiki:
構

Значения

Устраивать, строить; приготавливаться; беспокоиться, заботиться

Мнемоника

Деревянные 木 строительные леса в развернутой проекции. Вверху — столбы и поперечины для передней, видимой части фасада, внизу — то же самое, развернутое на 180 градусов, для задней. Строить с использованием лесов.

Варианты

构
purpleculture_pinyin:
gòu
to construct; to form; to make up; to compose; literary composition; paper mulberry (Broussonetia papyrifera)
строить; формировать; накраситься; сочинять; литературная композиция; бумажная шелковица (Broussonetia papyrifera)
rtega_mnemonic:
構構RS
构构		frame, building, structure
  • interweaved 冓 pieces of wood 木: frame or building structure/pieces of wood 木 hooked 勾 together forming a frame or building structure
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 构)
Pictophonetic: 冓 indicates the sound; 木 (wood) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
構成 [ gòu chéng ]: to constitute; to form; to compose; to make up; to configure (computing)
構建 [ gòu jiàn ]: to construct (sth abstract)
構築 [ gòu zhù ]: to build; to construct
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 木 [ mù ] tree; wood, lumber; wooden
    • 冓 [ gòu ] secret, niche, hiding-hole, cabinet
heisig_chinese_memo: Trees with good posture look like funnels, and get photographed and framed.
heisig_constituent: posture, tree, wood, funnel, cone, celery, again
koohiiStory1: Ideal posture is standing tall like a tree and having a V shape like a funnel
koohiiStory2: I fell out of a tree and broke my neck. So they put one of those white funnels around my neck to correct my posture.
jp_example_words:
構え(かまえ): posture, pose, style
構える(かまえる): to set up
機構(きこう): mechanism, organization
構想(こうそう): plan, plot, idea, conception
構う(かまう): mind, care about, be concerned about
構成(こうせい): organization, composition
構造(こうぞう): structure, construction
結構(けっこう): splendid, nice, wonderful, delicious, sweet, construction, architecture, well enough, tolerably
jp_readingExamples: 構う (かま.う), 構える (かま.える)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A lifeguard will choose a tree to set up the station where he'll care for the people on the beach and in the water. Trees provide the shade lifeguards need to take care of half-drowned kids and grannies with sand stuck in their bathing suits. That's why they set up their care stations here.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Watch the lifeguard walk around the beach. He needs to pick a nice big tree for his set up, so he can provide the best care possible.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You look closer at the set up and realize the lifeguard is こういち! You know he teaches Japanese but... is こういち really qualified to care for people like this?
WaniKani_Reading_Info:
Imagine こういち setting up a care station. You hope you don't get in trouble in the water so you don't have to see how good he is at caring for people.
Hint: when you see the "lifeguard" radical, the reading is probably going to be こう.
Ru_Russian: строение, поза, забота, беспокойство о чём-то
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 購 (コウ покупка, подписка), 講 (コウ лекция), 溝 (みぞ、どぶ、コウ канава).
Ru_Words:
構うかまう
  • заботиться, беспокоиться о чём-л, оказывать внимание кому-л
  • вмешиваться во что-л., иметь дело с кем-чем-л
    • 構えかまえ
  • структура, конструкция, устройство, вид
  • готовность, поза (в частности при стрельбе, фехтовании и т. п.)
    • warodai
    結構けっこう
  • вполне достаточно
    • warodai
    構造こうぞう
  • структура
    • 構築こうちく
  • сооружение, постройка, строительство
    • 心構えこころがまえ
  • готовность
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), 冂 (перевёрнутая коробка), 十 (десять), 木 (дерево)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: with trees (木) and a well again (冓) you can build something
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A wooden cast which keeps a picture from bending is a frame.

構字的基本解释

構
gòu
见“构”。

構字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gòu］
［《廣韻》古候切，去候，見。］
“冓1”的今字。“构2”的繁体字。
(1)架木造屋。
(2)房屋，屋宇。
(3)基业，业绩。
(4)缔造，建立。
(5)连结，交合。
(6)拟定，创作。多指诗文写作而言。
(7)指文学艺术作品。
(8)图谋。
(9)诬陷，陷害。
(10)挑拨离间。
(11)木名。即楮树。落叶乔木，叶似桑，皮可造纸。参见“楮”。
(12)通“購”。悬赏。
(13)通“篝”。参见“構火”。
(14)通“遘”。相遇。参见“構禍”。

構字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　構； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页546第07
【唐韻】古?切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】居?切，?音遘。【說文】蓋也。杜林以爲榱桷字。【玉篇】架屋也。【書·大誥】厥子乃弗肯堂，矧肯構。　又【廣雅】合也。【易·繫辭】男女構精，萬物化生。【詩·小雅】我日構禍。　又成也。【前漢·黥布傳】事已構矣。【唐書·楊師道傳】賦詩如宿構。又附會以成之亦曰構。【左傳·桓十六年】宣姜與公子朔構急子。　又結起也。【前漢·陳勝傳】夜構火。　又閒?也。【後漢·隗囂傳】勿用傍人解構之言。　又楮木別名。【物類相感志】構膠可以塗丹砂。　又【唐韻】古慕切，音故。【荀子·勸學篇】彊自取柱，柔自取束。邪穢在身，怨之所構。束音絮。　又【集韻】同桷。

構字的源字形

Structure
Basic explanation of words
Structure
gòu
See "construction".
Structure
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gòu］
["Guangyun" ancient waiting cut, go waiting, see you. ]
The present character of "冓1". The traditional characters of "construction 2".
(1) Building a wooden house.
(2) Houses, houses.
(3) Foundation and performance.
(4) Create and establish.
(5) Linking and mingling.
(6) Drafting and creating. Refers more to poetry writing.
(7) Refers to literary and artistic works.
(8) Plot.
(9) Frame up, frame up.
(10) Sow discord.
(11) Wooden names. That is, the Chu tree. Deciduous trees, leaves resemble mulberries, and the bark can be used to make paper. See "Chu".
(12) Through "purchase". Offer a reward.
(13) Through "bon". See "Construction of Fire".
(14) Through "escape". Meet. See "constructing disaster".

Evil is in the body, constructed by grievances. Shu Yinxu.　[Jiyun] Same as Jiyun.

Structure
Name meaning
Nothing.
gòu
вм. 构
Radicals: 木, 冓  (tree, lifeguard)
Meaning Mnemonic
A lifeguard will choose a tree to set up the station where he'll care for the people on the beach and in the water. Trees provide the shade lifeguards need to take care of half-drowned kids and grannies with sand stuck in their bathing suits. That's why they set up their care stations here.
Watch the lifeguard walk around the beach. He needs to pick a nice big tree for his set up, so he can provide the best care possible.
Reading Mnemonic
You look closer at the set up and realize the lifeguard is こういち! You know he teaches Japanese but... is こういち really qualified to care for people like this?
Imagine こういち setting up a care station. You hope you don't get in trouble in the water so you don't have to see how good he is at caring for people.
Hint: when you see the "lifeguard" radical, the reading is probably going to be こう.
